definitions.definition: Of, relating to, or derived from tradition.
definitions.example: I think her traditional values are antiquated.

definitions.definition: Communicated from ancestors to descendants by word only.
Observant of tradition; attached to old customs; old-fashioned.
In lieu of the name of the composer of a piece of music, whose real name is lost in the mists of time.

definitions.example: The traditional form of the character has twice as many strokes as the simplified form.
